Missions.Title: First Steps
Missions.Description: Complete the tutorial to begin your journey.

Missions.Title: Gathering Resources
Missions.Description: Collect 10 pieces of wood.

Missions.Title: Blacksmith's Favor
Missions.Description: Deliver 5 iron ores to the blacksmith.

Missions.Title: Hunter's Challenge
Missions.Description: Hunt 3 wild boars.

Missions.Title: Explorer's Spirit
Missions.Description: Visit the ancient ruins.

Missions.Title: Master Fisherman
Missions.Description: Catch 5 different types of fish.

Missions.Title: Defend the Village
Missions.Description: Defeat 10 attacking goblins.

Missions.Title: Hidden Treasure
Missions.Description: Find the lost treasure chest in the caves.

Missions.Title: The Herbalist's Request
Missions.Description: Gather 8 healing herbs from the forest.

Missions.Title: Arena Champion
Missions.Description: Win 3 battles in the arena.

Missions.Title: Cave Explorer
Missions.Description: Explore the deep cave and reach its end.

Missions.Title: The King's Favor
Missions.Description: Deliver a message to the king's castle.

Missions.Title: Merchant's Request
Missions.Description: Trade 15 apples in the market.

Missions.Title: The Lost Puppy
Missions.Description: Find and return the lost puppy to its owner.

Missions.Title: Mining Expedition
Missions.Description: Mine 20 stones from the quarry.

Missions.Title: The Bandit Leader
Missions.Description: Defeat the leader of the bandits in the mountains.

Missions.Title: Sacred Relic
Missions.Description: Retrieve the sacred relic from the temple.

Missions.Title: Swift Messenger
Missions.Description: Deliver 3 urgent messages across the town.

Missions.Title: Alchemy Experiment
Missions.Description: Craft a powerful potion.

Missions.Title: Final Trial
Missions.Description: Complete the final test of strength and wisdom.
